verses.verse: Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good;<s%> for his loving <S%H2896>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H430>gods;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of <S%H113>lords;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who alone <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6381>wonders;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who spread <S%H7554>out<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> above the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H216>lights;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> by <S%H3117>day;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
The <S%H3394>moon<s%> and <S%H3556>stars<s%> to <S%H4475>rule<s%> by <S%H3915>night;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who <S%H5221>struck<s%> down the <S%H4714>Egyptian<s%> <S%H1060>firstborn;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
And brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2617>them;<s%> for his loving kindness endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
With a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who <S%H1504>divided<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H1506>apart;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
And made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to pass <S%H5674>through<s%> its <S%H8432>midst;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
But <S%H5287>overthrew<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H2428>army<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who <S%H3212>led<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
To him who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
And <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>kings;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
<S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
And <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> as an <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
Even a <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
Who <S%H2142>remembered<s%> us in our low <S%H8216>estate;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever;<s%>
And has <S%H6561>delivered<s%> us from our <S%H6862>adversaries;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever:<s%>
Who <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> to every <S%H1320>creature;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
